snippet.title: Flashover MegaSector: Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Flashover MegaSector is a shoot 'em up with vector style graphics. Defeat the Hapsy Crew, a band of space pirates, using your powerful but frail spaceship.

Game available NOW on Steam, itch.io and GameJolt:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1197380/Flashover_MegaSector/
https://happy-frog-games.itch.io/flashover-megasector
https://gamejolt.com/games/flashover_megasector/436040
